short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beautify Your Search Engine Homepage, Go!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin can beautify your search engine homepage, including Google and Baidu, by customizing the homepage background, prettifying the search input box, and filtering some useless page elements.
